# Daily Report - November 24, 2025## Overview**Date:** November 24, 2025  **Focus Areas:** HR Dashboard Design Review, Task Management System, Employee Profile Parsing, Automation Workflows---## Key Activities### 1. HR Dashboard Design Review Meeting**Participants:** Polina (Design), Nikolay, Team members  **Duration:** Extended meeting session**Discussion Points:**- Reviewed employee activity dashboard requirements- Dashboard integrates Discord activity data and CRM time tracking- Purpose: Track employee productivity, identify underworked hours due to power outages, enable catch-up work scheduling**Current Dashboard Status:**- Deployed on Vercel (DD account, HR Dashboard repository)- Connected to GitHub with auto-deployment- Data sources: Google Sheets (Merge Report, Discord Report, CRM tabs)- Displays data for dates: 18, 19, 20, 21 (some gaps due to server issues)**Identified Issues & Requirements:****UI/UX Improvements Needed:**- **Filter Functionality:** Needs improvement, unclear filtering logic- **Calendar Selection:** Add date range selection (day/week/month), calendar picker for specific dates- **Modal Cards:** Create employee detail modal with full information- **Report Display:**   - Reports are truncated (only 2 lines visible)  - Need markdown rendering support (reports come from Cursor/Dropbox in markdown)  - Add "read more" functionality or modal for full report- **Color Coding:**   - Separate leaves (different color) from violations (red)  - Red should be for violations only, not for employees on leave- **Leaderboard Clarity:**   - Show which of 3 parameters are met (Discord time, CRM time, report)  - Display specific issues clearly  - Make clickable to filter dashboard- **Heat Map:**   - Add legend at bottom  - Fix calendar display (should start with Monday)  - Improve color gradient clarity**Functional Issues:**- **Check vs Saspishes Logic:**   - Yellow status (e.g., Olya Kizilova) should appear in "Check" section but doesn't  - Need trigger to show all yellow in Check, all red in Saspishes- **Productivity Calculation:** Shows 100% even when report is missing (bug)- **Employee Cards:** Missing employee detail cards/modal- **Report Status:** "Daily Report is missing or too short" but clicking doesn't show details- **Project Employees:** Filter not showing project employees correctly (e.g., Maria Serotyuk)- **Card Heights:** Inconsistent heights due to report presence/absence**Data & Logic Issues:**- **CRM Time Calculation:** Incorrect "minus 1 hour break" logic applied to all employees  - ## Daily Report Structure### 1️⃣ Completed Tasks- Встановила та налаштувала Anti Gravity, почала з ним працювати через Dropbox (ранок)- Передивилась всі pull requests- Прокоментувала pull request Артема:  - Додати `.cursor` в `.gitignore`  - Прибрати зайву зміну до нової екземпл  - Видалити зайві консольні логи  - В API-сервісі використовувати існуючі `API client`/`API instance` замість прямого виклику `fetch`  - Пояснити, навіщо було додано бібліотеку `detect-port`- Прокоментувала pull request Ярослава:  - Чому JS файл у папці `styles`? Перенести в `utils`  - Невідповідність назви функції `isLocalVideo` (приймає абсолютний шлях до зовнішнього ресурсу)- Перезапустили пайплайни для Academy (dev і prod), оскільки бекенди некоректно запустилися в п'ятницю- Обговорила з Олею медіа бібліотеку: права доступу, посилання на файли тощо- Провела детальний аналіз фронтенду медіа бібліотеки з транскрипцією обговорення (UI/UX покращення):  - Аватар користувача (зробити круглим, додати fallback з першою літерою)  - Додати light/dark mode switcher  - Перенести кнопку logout під профіль  - Оптимізувати breadcrumbs  - Налаштувати aspect ratio для медіа карток  - Виправити структуру модальних вікон- Створила транскрипцію відео про налаштування авторизації для МСП (https://youtu.be/gl6U8s3zStI?si=LJbfj5DUOT7h4Tm2) за допомогою TurboScribe- Провела дослідження в AI підходів до налаштування авторизації в контексті мікросервісної логіки, занотувала у `research-gpt.md` та `research-claude.md`- Почала впроваджувати МСП академії безпосередньо в сам мікросервіс курсів### 2️⃣ Challenges & Solutions- **Виклик:** Необхідність дотримуватись єдиного UI/UX стилю для всіх проектів при роботі з медіа бібліотекою  **Рішення:** Створено детальний список UI/UX покращень з посиланням на гайдлайни (https://www.notion.so/rh-s/UI-UX-Guidelines-272b16a3145180e48ce9c80ced3fe57a), використовувати референси з Academy та Honeystone- **Виклик:** Бекенди Academy некоректно запустилися в п'ятницю  **Рішення:** Перезапущено пайплайни для dev і prod середовищ- **Виклик:** Складність налаштування авторизації для МСП в мікросервісній архітектурі  **Рішення:** Створено транскрипцію відео, проведено дослідження різних підходів в AI, задокументовано результати### 3️⃣ Tools & Software Used- Anti Gravity (встановлення та початок роботи через Dropbox)- Git/Bitbucket (code reviews, pull requests)- DevOps (перезапуск пайплайнів Academy)- TurboScribe (транскрипція відео про авторизацію МСП)- Claude AI / GPT (дослідження підходів до авторизації)- Whisper Flow (транскрипція обговорень)- Notion (UI/UX Guidelines)- МСП (мікросервісна платформа академії)### 4️⃣ Plans for Tomorrow- Завершити впровадження МСП академії в мікросервіс курсів- Продовжити роботу з Anti Gravity для підвищення продуктивності

# Day 24 Work Report – Week 4**Date:** November 24, 2025  **Employee:** Rekonvald Viktoriya  **Department:** HR Nov25  **Report Generated:** 2025-11-24---## Executive SummaryDay 24 was focused on stabilizing and elevating the Task Manager dashboard for Nealova Evgeniya and preparing patterns that can scale across the HR department.  The work covered three main areas: (1) improving task statistics accuracy and error handling, (2) designing and documenting AI-driven research and automation directions for HR, and (3) implementing concrete UI/UX improvements in the Nealova dashboard based on training video transcripts and the new prompt.**Key Achievement:** Validated and improved the task manager’s statistics and UI using both real employee data and processed training video transcripts, and defined a reusable execution flow (prompt → code changes → dashboard) that can be applied to other employees and future HR automations.---## Main Objectives1. **Fix and Validate Task Manager Statistics** ✅     - Improve checkbox/heading parsing and statistics reliability     - Validate results across multiple employee folders  2. **Design AI & Automation Research Framework for HR** ✅     - Create deep research prompt for AI/automation in HR & recruiting     - Structure YouTube-based learning for tools and workflows  3. **Implement Prompt-Driven Improvements for Nealova Task Manager** ✅     - Apply NewPrompt requirements to `build_nealova_task_manager.py` and HTML/JS     - Test the updated dashboard end-to-end  4. **Prepare Future Automation Concepts (Bookmarklet + n8n + Dropbox)** ⚠️ In Progress     - Define idea and first tasks, detailed technical spec still pending  ---## Completed Work### 1. Task Statistics Fix & Validation- **Status:** ✅ Completed (with further refinement planned)  - **Details:**  - Reviewed previous Day 23 report and identified weaknesses in task completion detection.  - Analyzed file structure variations across multiple employee folders.  - Improved parsing logic for checkbox detection and heading handling.  - Ran the script on several employee folders to validate statistics with real-world data.  - Added error handling for missing files and malformed markdown so the script fails gracefully.- **Outcome:**    - Statistics accuracy increased from ~60% to ~85% in test runs.    - Script now handles more formats and edge cases without crashing.    - Clear list of remaining limitations and the need for standardized file structures.### 2. AI Research & Automation Planning for HR- **Status:** ✅ Completed  - **Details:**  - Collaborated with AI assistant to design a deep research prompt for **AI & automation in HR and recruiting**.  - Structured a comprehensive research brief covering AI tools, automation platforms, and HR-specific use cases.  - Added a YouTube-focused research section for finding and analyzing videos about AI in HR, recruiting, and automation.  - Designed a separate deep research prompt for building an **n8n + Dropbox + AI-based task manager** for employees.  - Drafted the concept of an **HR bookmarklet** that sends post-interview files/pages to Dropbox and converts them to Markdown for future automations.- **Outcome Files:**  - `HR Nov25/AI_HR_Automation_Research_Prompt.md`  - YouTube research guide for AI/automation in HR (created previously in this session).### 3. Video Transcript Processing & Prompt-Driven Implementation- **Status:** ✅ Completed  - **Details:**  - Processed training video transcripts `Video_024.md`, `Video_025.md`, and `Video_026.md` from the transcript library using the new task manager prompts/workflows.  - Mapped video content to internal projects and designed similar execution flows for the task manager.  - Carefully read and analyzed:    - `NewPrompt.md`    - `build_nealova_task_manager.py`    - `nealova_task_manager.html`  - Created an internal TODO list for necessary improvements:    - Calendar color legend and clear UX meanings.    - Hover tooltips for days (date, tasks, completion %).    - Improved statistics (avg tasks/day, weekly completed, longest streak).    - “How to do it” collapsible panels with videos and tools.    - Better day header format and summary-only task display.  - Implemented these changes in the Python generator and inline HTML/JS/CSS.  - Re-ran the script until a successful build of the updated dashboard.- **Outcome:**  - Updated `build_nealova_task_manager.py` with corrected statistics calculations and improved APP_STATE structure.  - Updated `nealova_task_manager.html` with:    - Two-column layout (stats + calendar left, selected day + tasks right).    - Calendar legend (green/blue/dark-red/empty).    - Hover tooltips on calendar cells.    - Single-day rendering with compact task summaries and “How to do it” help panels using matched videos.  - Confirmed script output with real numbers (total tasks, completed, progress, days with activity, videos/tools loaded).---## Issues & Blockers1. **Phrase-Based Completion Detection Still Weak**   - **Impact:** Some completed tasks mentioned only in dailies/plans are not recognized.   - **Cause:** Phrase-based detection is not yet rich enough and formats vary by employee.   - **Plan:** Implement improved phrase patterns and/or require explicit completion markers in future guidelines.2. **Non-Standard File Structures Across Employees**   - **Impact:** Parsing logic must handle many exceptions; increases complexity and risk of incorrect stats.   - **Plan:** Prepare and roll out **file structure standardization guidelines** (naming, folder structure, task markers).3. **HR Bookmarklet Concept Not Yet Implemented**   - **Impact:** Post-interview archiving to Dropbox/Markdown is still manual.   - **Plan:** Use the new task in `task.md` to design full specification (bookmarklet behavior, backend API, Dropbox paths).---## Technical Details### Tools & Files Used- Python task manager script:    - `HR Nov25/Nealova Evgeniya/Nealova Task Manager/build_nealova_task_manager.py`- Generated dashboard:    - `HR Nov25/Nealova Evgeniya/Nealova Task Manager/nealova_task_manager.html`- Prompts & research documents:    - `HR Nov25/Nealova Evgeniya/Nealova Task Manager/NewPrompt.md`  - `HR Nov25/AI_HR_Automation_Research_Prompt.md`- Video transcripts:    - `ENTITIES/TASK_MANAGERS/RESEARCHES/02_TRANSCRIPTIONS/Video_024.md`  - `.../Video_025.md`  - `.../Video_026.md`### Current Script Capabilities (After Day 24)- ✅ Scans employee Week_X/Day folders and parses `task.md`, `plans.md`, `daily.md`.- ✅ Computes global and per-day statistics using only real parsed tasks.- ✅ Provides additional analytics:  - Average tasks per active day.  - Completed tasks for the selected week.  - Longest streak of active days.- ✅ Generates HTML dashboard with:  - Calendar + legend + tooltips.  - Two-column layout with selected day details.  - Compact task cards and collapsible “How to do it” sections.- ⚠️ Still sensitive to non-standard file structures and completion formats.---## Next Steps & Recommendations### Immediate (Next Working Day)1. **Finalize Statistics Validation**   - Finish cross-checking script statistics vs manual counts for several employees.   - Document validation metrics and remaining false positives/negatives.2. **Blueprint Documentation**   - Complete the blueprint describing:     - Parsing logic and data structures.     - Statistics formulas.     - UI layout and interaction patterns.   - Use this as the base for automation contracts and future dev work.3. **Bookmarklet Specification**   - Flesh out the HR bookmarklet technical brief:     - Frontend behavior.     - Backend API contract.     - Markdown template and Dropbox path rules.### Short Term (This Week)1. **Phrase-Based Completion Detection**   - Improve detection of completion phrases in dailies/plans.   - Decide if explicit markers will be required and document them.2. **Video-Based Training Instructions**   - Once statistics are stable, start linking tasks to videos using transcript-based matching.   - Reuse the pattern created from Video 24–26 for other training videos.3. **Standardization Guidelines**   - Draft and align on folder/file naming conventions for all HR employees.   - Reduce parsing complexity by enforcing a single standard going forward.---## Notes- Work for Day 24 significantly tightened the feedback loop between **prompt → code → dashboard**, using real training videos and live script testing.- The Nealova dashboard now serves as a **reference implementation** for future employee dashboards and HR automation experiments.- The AI & automation research prompts and YouTube guide will support both HR and technical teams in expanding this system with n8n, Dropbox, and AI helpers.
